articles.title: Europe's space agency reviewing space-based solar power - UPI News
articles.description: Solar power could be easier to harness from space, though the technology needed to beam it back to Earth is still in the developmental stage.
articles.content:

articles.title: Europe to be hit hardest in global slowdown -OECD - Reuters
articles.description: The global economy should avoid a recession next year but the worst energy crisis since the 1970s will trigger a sharp slowdown, with Europe hit hardest, the OECD said, adding that fighting inflation should be policymakers' top priority.
